channel.title: How do i UNMUTE a player?
channel.description: A lot of admins on my server are thinking it will be funny to mute players and the players are getting mad, is there a way to unmute players, o btw i'm using fr33sc4p3 pkz source.

item.title: How do i UNMUTE a player?
item.dc:creator: @OWNER_2007 OWNER 2007
item.description:
@OWNER_2007 wrote:

Huh?? Umm…dude that is a quote from SOMEONE ELSE [size=9]NOT ME[/size]

More info file is in the source folder

Read full topic
item.source: How do i UNMUTE a player?

item.title: How do i UNMUTE a player?
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

What exactly is a more info file, and if u need help with ur server i will help u, first off ur server ip isn’t 127.0.0.1, that is the ip of either ur localhost(ur server) or hybridscape if u don’t have a server, so u need to port forward, look in the tutorial section, plenty of tutorials on it. Also u need to make a no-ip at no-ip.com

Read full topic
item.source: How do i UNMUTE a player?

item.title: How do i UNMUTE a player?
item.dc:creator: @OWNER_2007 OWNER 2007
item.description:
@OWNER_2007 wrote:

MoreInfo file, player name, “playerMuteDate = #”
Change the # to 0

Read full topic
item.source: How do i UNMUTE a player?
